LanguageData.RopeLight.label: Cuerda LED ligera
LanguageData.RopeLight.description: Esta cuerda de luz LED, se puede colocar sobre paredes y otros edificios. Requiere 25 W y se puede utilizar para ayudar a mover la energía alrededor de otras áreas inaccesibles.
LanguageData.RopeLight_Blueprint.label: LED rope light (blueprint)
LanguageData.RopeLight_Blueprint_Install.label: LED rope light (blueprint)
LanguageData.RopeLight_Frame.label: LED rope light (building)
LanguageData.RopeLight_Frame.description: This LED rope light can be placed over walls and other buildings. It requires 25 W and can be used to help move power around otherwise inaccessable areas.
